short_summary: One Mini Pumper with a 12 foot walk-around body to be delivered to Borden Ontario.
description: The department has a requirement to purchase One Mini Pumper with a 12 foot walk-around body. The delivery date is 365 days from the date of the notice. The estimated duration of the contract is from March 5, 2023, to September 1, 2024.  The vendor is required to be able to deliver the product within a timeframe of December 1, 2023, to April 1, 2024. The notes specify that any additional information needed should be contacte Kyle Grundy DLP 5-3-6 kyle.grundy@forces.gc.ca.  This opportunity is available to suppliers from all Provinces in Canada and around the world. The solicitation call reference number is W8476-0236657  and this is amendment 3 to the notification based on an amendment made on February 7, 2023, the last original document notified by procurement notice  W8476-236657 BT349 was notification by the department made on December 19, 2022, which originally requested the bid submission from July 18, 2023, to August 18, 2023.}
duration_in_months: , then Parses the data from section  above
full_summary:
---

**Notice Title**: Mini Pumper with 12 Foot Walk Around Body Procurement

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01017821

**Solicitation Number**: W8476-236657/A

**Publication Date**: Monday, December 19, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: Friday, February 10, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
**Amendment Date**: Wednesday, February 7, 2023

**Description**: The Department of National Defence is soliciting bids for one (1) Mini Pumper with a 12-foot walk-around body vehicle with a delivery date of 365 days from the contract start date. The vehicle will be delivered to Borden, Ontario.

**Required Documents**:
- Amendment 2 (PDF, 2023/02/07)
- Solicitation Document (PDF, 2022/12/19)
- Amendment 1 (PDF, 2023/01/16)

**Contract Details**: The contract is expected to commence on March 5, 2023, and end on September 1, 2024. The delivery timeframe for the vehicle is from December 1, 2023, to April 1, 2024.

**Eligible RFx Response Groups**: *Firefighting Trucks

**Pre-Qualification and Qualification Requirements**: Suppliers must meet the minimum pre-qualification requirements, including but not limited to:

- Registration with the Bidder Registry
- Canadian Goods and Services Tax (GST) number
- Certificate of Origin from the manufacturer
- Evidence of manufacturer's warranty for a minimum period of five (5) years

**Classification Code**: N4210PD (Trucks, Firefighting)

**Trade Agreements**: This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

**Pont of Contact**: For more information, please contact:
- Kyle Grundy
- Policy Lead, DND
- e-mail: [
